name: Destroy Blocks
description:
Check the original Ludum Dare 38 Version of this game here:

https://gamejolt.com/games/Destroy_Blocks/251837

Look at the Ludum Dare Game Page here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum...

The theme for Ludum Dare 38 was "A Small World".

Instructions:

Destroy as many blocks as possible in the small world! There is a time limit of 60 seconds! Avoid getting killed by enemies to maximize time to destroy blocks! Shoot and kill enemies to defend yourself!

How to Play:
WASD keys= Move
Mouse= Look Around
Z= Toggle Gravity
Space= Jump
 ( Or Fly Upwards If Gravity Is Disabled ) 
C= Fly Downwards If Gravity is Disabled
Left Click= Destroy Blocks
Right Click= Shoot
X= Return to Main Menu
